entry.title: Mailing List Future
entry.summary:
Vincent expresses enthusiasm for contributing to a project with the stipulation that machine learning moderation is fully implemented, indicating confidence in managing any potential issues related to emails being marked as spam, particularly for email services not hosted by Microsoft. He also offers assistance with hosting responsibilities, suggesting a collaborative approach to the project's technical needs.
This collaboration appears to be centered around an initiative that uses machine learning to moderate content, perhaps to ensure its relevance and appropriateness. Vincent's optimism about the efficacy of this system suggests that he believes it will minimize the inconvenience of dealing with unwanted emails. His specific mention of Microsoft-hosted email services implies that there may be known challenges with them regarding spam filtering which he anticipates will be manageable. The offer to assist with hosting indicates a willingness to provide practical support in addition to his engagement with the project's moderation strategy.
